name: golden doodle legion #000
description: “golden doodle legion #000 is a gift to all who placed bids on legion spirits #001-#012. you all have made this project so exciting and welcomed an idea that was birthed from many nights brimming in anxieties, apprehensive thoughts on simulation theory, no pencil drawing rituals, & mulling over nostalgias from over a decade of survival solely from the arts. i exist because of my inner gift of creativity. i am inspired by life. daily i rejoice from the path i decided on as it has brought me wisdom, bliss, experiences, and knowledge that has aged my soul in the most fruitful ways. often times i wonder if i may have opened pandoras box, or might have come into contact with some form of parallel realities through my practice. this golden doodle legion spirit was inspired by John Karel aka @jjjjjjjjjjohn & their iconic window series..i hope he sees this. https://twitter.com/jjjjjjjjjjohn thank you” -leeaux / doodle legion / leeaux.com / doodlelegion.xyz
